```{r}
setwd("~/Desktop/GitHub/RNAseq_allsites_Barshisreference/WGCNA/")
avgred <- read.csv("../../CBASS_bleachingdata/clean data/avgred_data_normalized_recovery.csv")
phenotype_heats <- read.csv("Heats_only_5202021/phenotypedata_justheats_05212021.csv")

```

```{r}

avgred <- mutate(avgred, Site = derivedFactor(
  "Ftele" = (grepl("Faga'tele", avgred$Site)),
  "Falu" = (grepl("Faga'alu", avgred$Site)),
  "Vat" = (grepl("Vatia", avgred$Site)),
  "Can" = (grepl("Cannery", avgred$Site)),
  "CoPt" = (grepl("Coconut Point", avgred$Site)),
  method ="first",
  .default = NA
))


avgred$Sample <- paste0(avgred$Site,"_H_rep",avgred$Colony)

avgred_avgs <- avgred %>%
  filter(!is.na(t35_normalizedto28)) %>%
  group_by(Sample) %>%
  summarise(mean_t35normto28 = mean(t35_normalizedto28), mean_35 = mean(X35), DIN = mean(DIN), pop2016 = mean(pop2016))


new_phenotype_heats <- merge(phenotype_heats, avgred_avgs, all = T)

write.csv(new_phenotype_heats, "Heats_only_5202021/phenotypedata_justheats_05212021.csv")

```
